General.Name: Wuxi Honghui New Materials Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Honghui New Materials Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of vinyl chloride-vinyl acetate copolymer resin and vinyl chloride copolymer emulsion products in China. It provides vinyl binary copolymer resin, carboxyl-containing vinyl terpolymer resin, hydroxyl-containing vinyl terpolymer resin, vinyl chloride copolymer emulsion, etc.; and water-based epoxy and emulsion acrylic products. The company's products are used in inks, paints, coatings for PVC products; and color chips, adhesives, and plastic processing products, as well as PVC plastic floors, magnetic cards, building materials, etc. It is also involved in exporting activities. Wuxi Honghui New Materials Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuxi, China.
General.Address: New Material Industrial Park, Wuxi, China, 214196
